author: Octopus Deploy
description: Node.js API client for Octopus Deploy
name: @octopusdeploy/octopusdeploy

scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run docs
scripts.docs: openapi-generator generate -g markdown -i spec/swagger.json -o docs --skip-validate-spec -p withSeparateModelsAndApi=true -p apiPackage=client -p modelPackage=model -p withoutPrefixEnums=true -p withInterfaces=true
scripts.prebuild: openapi-generator generate --enable-post-process-file -g typescript-axios -i spec/swagger.json -o src --skip-validate-spec -p withSeparateModelsAndApi=true -p apiPackage=client -p modelPackage=model -p withoutPrefixEnums=true -p withInterfaces=true -p npmName=@octopusdeploy/octopusdeploy -t templates
